title: Vegito
skill:
When this card attacks, draw 1 card.
If it's your opponent's turn : When one of your blue Unison Cards would be placed in your Drop Area or one of your blue Battle Cards is removed from your Battle Area by an opponent's skill or KO'd, you may flip this card over. If you do, draw 2 cards.
When your life is at 4 or less : You may draw 1 card, then switch up to 1 of your energy to Active Mode and flip this card over.
skill_back:
When this card attacks, draw 1 card.
: Choose 1 of your blue Unison Cards and it gets +10000 power and for the battle.
If it's your opponent's turn : When one of your blue Unison Cards would be placed in your Drop Area or one of your blue Battle Cards is removed from your Battle Area by an opponent's skill or KO'd, switch up to 1 of your mono-blue energy to Active Mode and draw 1 card.

title: Gogeta, Pursuit of Power
skill:
If your Leader Card is a blue 《Saiyan》 card and you have a blue 《Saiyan》 Battle Card in play in Rest Mode, your Leader Cards don't take damage from attacks.
Choose 1 of your Leader Cards or Battle Cards and switch it to Rest Mode : Add a marker to this card.
Draw 1 card, then choose 1 of your opponent's Battle Cards with an energy cost greater than their current energy, ignoring , and place it at the bottom of its owner's deck.

title: SSB Son Goku, Tenacious Warrior
skill:
Add 1 card from your life to your hand : When this card attacks, it gets +11000 power for the turn.
When this card is KO'd, look at up to 7 cards from the top of your deck, add up to 1 blue Unison Card with a specified cost of 2 among them to your hand, then shuffle your deck.

title: SS Trunks, Architect of Peace
